column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Chicago Cut was my favorite steak until I had the 16 oz. bone-in filet at Bavette's.  Coupled with the garlic mashed potatoes and butternut squash sides
column2: you easily have the best meal in the entire city of Chicago.  Calling it phenomenal was an understatement.  Can't wait to go back here again...just make your reservations a month or so in advance.  Tough to get in to .
